    Welcome to my homepage!

    Feiyu Li

    AI Scientist • Data Scientist • Plasma Physicist

    Current Position

    I am currently a research scientist at New Mexico Consortium and was previously a postdoc at Los Alamos National Lab.

    Research Focus

    I am primarily interested in Artificial Intelligence, Large Language Models, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Data Science, and Plasma Technologies, with applications in both industry and frontier science.

    Industry Applications:

    • Search & Recommendation Systems
    • Forecasting & Time Series Analysis
    • Process Optimization
    • Risk Management

    Scientific Applications:

    • Compact Particle Accelerators
    • Space Science & Astrophysics
    • Fusion Energy Research

    AI/ML Projects

    I've developed several cutting-edge ML/Deep Learning/LLM-based applications:

    RAG-based Tax Filing Chatbot

    A sophisticated chatbot using GPT, Pinecone, and Streamlit for intelligent tax assistance.

    View Project

    Proton Beam Energy Prediction

    Deep Learning model for predicting proton beam energy for therapeutic applications.

    View Project

    Cardiac Risk Identification

    XGBoost model for advanced cardiac risk assessment and prediction.

    View Project

    More AI projects coming soon!

    P. Singh#, F. Li# (equal first-author), et al.

    F. Li, Z. Sheng, et al.
